TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class TypeProvider : IDisposable, IServiceProvider, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeProvider extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider
Public NotInheritable Class TypeProvider Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider, ITypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: 的实现，充当指示的程序集和代码编译单元内类型的容器。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
除了处理已编译的程序集（<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssembly%2A> 方法）外，此 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddAssemblyReference%2A> 实现还可以处理尚未编译的类型 (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.AddCodeCompileUnit%2A>)。 将为使用 <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType> 引用的类型返回 <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit> 的受限实现。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider> 从引用程序集中仅返回公共类型，而从本地程序集中同时返回公共类型和非公共类型。

remarks.format:
